extendedInfo.description: THIS VERSION SHOWS ONLY RESULTS FROM BRAZIL..............................................................................Saving money and finding good deals is now very easy with SaveMe App for android. SaveMe is a Latin American portal that brings together all the deals announced in the collective buying sites in one place. As the name suggests, the site makes the user save time and money when searching for deals on the Web.â¨here are several deals in restaurants, bars, hotels, travel, parties, products, beauty, sports and more. With discount that you canât miss! With the SaveMe App you can filter offers by category and city and a search field where you can find exactly what you are looking for. Check out the best deals with SaveMe App.

reviews.title: N\303\243o t\303\252m as ofertas da minha cidade
reviews.comment: O app \303\251 bom, mas faltam as ofertas dos sites que atendem minha cidade.

reviews.title: N\303\243o \303\251 bem feito.
reviews.comment: Sistema de busca e filtragem n\303\243o funciona direito. Mais f\303\241cil olhar pelo navegador.

reviews.title: Bugado e sem todas as funcionalidades
reviews.comment: N\303\243o funciona. Filtrei as promo\303\247\303\265es de campinas, de restaurantes, bares e servi\303\247os locais. S\303\263 apareceram tr\303\252s promo\303\247\303\265es (no site tem muito mais). E n\303\243o me deu a op\303\247\303\243o de ordenar por dist\303\242ncia de um endere\303\247o.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: N\303\243o funciona
reviews.comment: Ao abrir o aplicativo fica com tela preta e ap\303\263s uns segundos da erro.
